forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. Southwest wind around 5 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 64, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

weather_report:
As the city begins to stir from slumber, a gentle blanket of clouds lingers over Downtown San Francisco, embodying the serene beauty of a spring night. The air is refreshingly crisp, with whispers of a southwest wind nudging softly through the streets. Although partly cloudy now, the promise of a brighter morning lies ahead with the sun set to rise into a mostly sunny sky as the day unfolds. Expect the warmth to creep near the mid-60s, though it will flirt with cooler tones in the afternoon as temperatures dip toward the low 60s.

The marine layer may still shroud certain pockets, particularly along the coast, creating a mysterious sense that whispers of the ocean’s embrace are ever-present. Yet, for those yearning for activity, the day invites exploration. A gentle jacket would be advisable in the morning chill, while layers make for an adaptable attire as the sun attempts to coax dance through the clouds. Perhaps a stroll along the Embarcadero, or a quiet visit to a local café, a book in hand, would suit perfectly. Today calls for subtle delights, as the city awakens under a tender sun ready to brighten its storied streets.
